CustomField.description: CSAT survey respondent’s response in qualitative label.
CustomField.formula: IF( ArdiraSurvey__CSAT_Score__c ==1, 'Very unsatisfied', IF(ArdiraSurvey__CSAT_Score__c ==2, 'Unsatisfied', IF(ArdiraSurvey__CSAT_Score__c ==3, 'Neutral', IF(ArdiraSurvey__CSAT_Score__c ==4, 'Satisfied', IF(ArdiraSurvey__CSAT_Score__c ==5, 'Very satisfied', '') ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CSAT survey respondent’s response in qualitative label.
CustomField.label: CSAT Response
